text: Kto pochitayet religiyu Allakha i obryady khadzhzha, ustanovlennyye Allakhom, razdayot zhertvennykh verblyudov i drugoy skot bednym v Zapretnoy mecheti, vybrav zdorovykh, krupnykh zhertvennykh zhivotnykh, tot i yest' bogoboyaznennyy. Ved' eto deyaniye - bogoboyaznennost' - v veruyushchikh serdtsakh, a takzhe priznak iskrennosti very
